statements: DELETE FROM proteomics_data WHERE expression_level > 10 AND protein_name = 'ABC';
DELETE FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 100 AND expression_level > 50;
DELETE FROM datasets WHERE source = 'RNA-Seq' AND date_uploaded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM proteins WHERE protein_name = 'ABC' AND expression_level >= 10;
DELETE FROM analysis_results WHERE result_id = 100 AND protein_id = 5;
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University ABC';
